	- INLINE ASM (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EVAN.sol#402-405)

detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EVAN.sol#323-329):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EVAN.sol#327)

Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EVAN.sol#389-410):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EVAN.sol#393)

EVAN.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EVAN.sol#730-732) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(msg.sender,1000000000000000000000000) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EVAN.sol#731)
